firstScene.description: Your starship is boldly going where no man has gone before when your comms officer in a fetching red miniskirt uniform informs you she is picking up what might be a distress signal coming from the nearby M class planet Regula Prime. Your science officer agrees that it looks like an older signal using a frequency that has long been discontinued due to its rather short range. The signals are very weak, but there are energy fluctuations from the planet possibly indicating advanced technology. Previously it was believed the planet was uninhabited. You form an away team. Suggested members include your science officer, your chief medical officer, if you can convince him to step into the transporter, the captain, of course, and maybe a few crewmen wearing bright red uniforms. You go to standard orbit and beam down. The adventure begins.

threads.name: What is the source of the distress signal?

characters.name: Survivors
characters.description: Placeholder for any survivors they might encounter

regions.name: The Crash Site
regions.description: The site of the colony ship's crash, a mix of wreckage and makeshift shelters.

locations.name: Landing Zone
locations.description: Where the away team lands their shuttle or beams down.

locations.name: Wreckage Site
locations.description: Remains of the original colony ship.

locations.name: Survivor Encampment
locations.description: Temporary shelters made from the ship's remains, now abandoned.

locations.name: Medical Tent
locations.description: First aid supplies and makeshift hospital. It appears to have been in use long ago, perhaps when the survivors first arrived. Now abandoned.

locations.name: Observation Point
locations.description: High ground for surveying the area.

encounters.name: Survivor's Welcome
encounters.description: Meet Dr. Elena Kova, the lead scientist of the survivors, who is cautious but welcoming.

encounters.name: Wreckage Investigation
encounters.description: Find a strange ancient device of alien origin among the wreckage.

encounters.name: Distress Beacon Malfunction
encounters.description: Repair the malfunctioning beacon, which provides clues about the colonists' situation.

encounters.name: Hidden Cache
encounters.description: Discover a hidden stash of advanced medical supplies, hinting at strange technology.

encounters.name: Security Patrol
encounters.description: Encounter a group of heavily armed colonists who are unusually aggressive. They don't seem happy to meet you or to be "rescued" by you.

encounters.name: Wildlife Attack
encounters.description: Ambushed by local predators, requiring quick thinking to fend them off.

encounters.name: Communication Disruption
encounters.description: A strange interference affects the away team's communication devices.

encounters.name: Mystery Illness
encounters.description: A team member falls ill with a mysterious ailment.

encounters.name: Clandestine Meeting
encounters.description: Overhear a secret conversation between colonists about "The Serum."

encounters.name: Old Journal
encounters.description: Find an old journal detailing early discoveries of the ancient technology.

objects.name: Colony Logbook
objects.description: Records of the initial discoveries of the ancient tech and early experiments.

objects.name: Broken Data Pad
objects.description: A damaged data pad containing encrypted files about...something.

objects.name: Energy Cell
objects.description: A power cell from the wreckage that matches the technology found...where?

objects.name: Map Fragment
objects.description: Part of a map showing the layout of an underground network.

objects.name: Personal Journal
objects.description: Diary of a colonist detailing their experience.

objects.name: Medical Kit
objects.description: Contains advanced medical tools and substances derived from somewhere? More advanced than expected technology...

keyedScenes.name: Wreckage Identified
keyedScenes.description: The _Columbus_ an early earth exploration vessel was lost in this region. The crew is able to identify this ship having crashed on this planet, but that was almost 200 years ago.

regions.name: The Forest
regions.description: A dense and mysterious forest, home to strange flora and fauna.

locations.name: Dense Underbrush
locations.description: Difficult to navigate, full of wildlife.

encounters.name: Guided Tour
encounters.description: Meet Marcus Ren, a friendly but evasive colonist who offers to act as a guide. He doesn't seem to like you wondering around on your own.

encounters.name: Natural Trap
encounters.description: The team encounters quicksand or a hidden pitfall.

encounters.name: Strange Flora
encounters.description: Encounter plants with unusual properties, some of which might have amazing medical uses.

encounters.name: Lost Child
encounters.description: Meet Lina, a young colonist who has wandered off and reveals bits of the colony's secret.

encounters.name: Hostile Wildlife
encounters.description: Ambush by aggressive, genetically altered creatures.

encounters.name: Ancient Markings
encounters.description: Discover ancient carvings that provide clues about a previous civilization.

encounters.name: Surveillance Devices
encounters.description: Find hidden surveillance equipment monitoring the forest.

encounters.name: Natural Healing Spring
encounters.description: Discover a spring with healing properties, used by the colonists.

encounters.name: Ambush
encounters.description: Ambushed by colonist security forces, leading to a tense standoff.

objects.name: Botanical Samples
objects.description: Plants native to the area seem useful. You take some to study their properties.

objects.name: Ancient Amulet
objects.description: An amulet or other artifact worn by the ancient civilization of this planet.

keyedScenes.name: Injury!
keyedScenes.description: One of your crew has suffered a serious injury and needs medical attention.

regions.name: Colony Town
regions.description: The heart of the colony survivors, a bustling town of people who seem to have been exceptionally prosperous.

locations.name: Hospital
locations.description: More advanced medical facility. In fact it seems very advanced.

encounters.name: Market Encounter
encounters.description: Meet Talia Mars, a friendly but curious market vendor. She has lots of questions about off planet life.

encounters.name: Public Speech
encounters.description: The colony leader gives a rousing speech about the colony's self-sufficiency.

encounters.name: Eavesdropping
encounters.description: Overhear colonists discussing the "treatment" they've received.

encounters.name: Suspicious Doctor
encounters.description: Meet Dr. Isaac Voss, the colony's secretive doctor.

encounters.name: Marketplace Incident
encounters.description: A conflict erupts in the marketplace, revealing tensions among colonists.

encounters.name: Hidden Clinic
encounters.description: Discover a hidden clinic where a serum is administered to colonists. No one wants to talk about this or what it is for.

encounters.name: Black Market
encounters.description: Encounter colonists trading stolen or illicit goods. These are people who might have information for a price.

encounters.name: Friendly Dinner
encounters.description: Invited to dinner with a colonist family, who inadvertently reveal too much.

encounters.name: Unusual Strength
encounters.description: Witness a colonist demonstrating unusual physical abilities.

encounters.name: Locked Building
encounters.description: Find a building that is heavily guarded and off-limits.

objects.name: Market Ledger
objects.description: A record of transactions that include references to something interesting.

objects.name: Secret Journal
objects.description: The personal journal of Dr. Isaac Voss, detailing his doubts about "the serum".

objects.name: Suspicious Package
objects.description: A package with vials of a serum and a note about its administration.

objects.name: Blueprints
objects.description: Plans for a hidden lab and its equipment.

objects.name: Strange Coin
objects.description: An ancient coin that seems like it must belong to the old inhabitants of the planet.

keyedScenes.name: We aren't leaving
keyedScenes.description: Hansen Rike, the leader of the survivors, thanks you for your concern but declares they are perfectly happy and have no intention of leaving. He is not a man who likes to be questioned. He is polite but firm and distant.

keyedScenes.name: Of course this happens
keyedScenes.description: Dr. Elena Kova, lead scientist who might have met already (if not you meet her now) becomes amorously interested in one of the crew. Determine who it is. She clearly has some obligation to her people and will not betray them, but she also clearly has information. I wonder how you could get it out of her...

regions.name: The Underground Network
regions.description: A maze of tunnels and chambers beneath the forest, holding secrets of the colony.

locations.name: Entrance to Secret Laboratory
locations.description: Ask your oracle if it's locked. I bet a phaser could cut through it if it is.

locations.name: Escape Route
locations.description: Leads back to the surface. But to an old abandoned city from the former inhabitants of the planet

encounters.name: Ancient Chamber
encounters.description: Find a room with ancient alien inscriptions.

encounters.name: Hostile Encounter
encounters.description: Ambushed by hostile colonists guarding the area.

encounters.name: Old Equipment
encounters.description: Discover old mining equipment repurposed for extracting materials.

encounters.name: Subterranean Water Source
encounters.description: There is a lot of it.

encounters.name: Collapse!
encounters.description: A tunnel collapses. Does it separate the team? Is anyone hurt? Ask the oracle. A good opportunity requiring teamwork.

encounters.name: Alien Artifact
encounters.description: Discover a powerful alien artifact

objects.name: Sample Vial
objects.description: A vial labeled with a date and sample number. Clearly old. It seems they have been experimenting with something for a long time.

objects.name: Hidden Camera
objects.description: A camera surveying the area. Have they seen you? Do they know you are here?

objects.name: Power Conduit
objects.description: A piece of alien technology used to power a hidden area.

objects.name: Rich vein of ore
objects.description: Your scans cannot identify it as any known substance.

keyedScenes.name: A sudden reversal
keyedScenes.description: Dr. Elena Kova, lead scientist who probably have met already turns up if she is not already with you. She is clearly distressed and asks you to leave the area and not pursue your investigation further.

regions.name: The Old City
regions.description: A forgotten city of the ancient civilization, holding clues to the serum's history.

locations.name: Council Hall
locations.description: Meeting place of old city leaders.

locations.name: Entrance to a Hidden Laboratory
locations.description: Ask your oracle if it's locked. I bet a phaser could cut through it if it is.

encounters.name: Encounter the Historian
encounters.description: Meet Elder Kor, a historian who knows much about the ancient civilization. He is a kind and wise acedemic and clearly has a love for the ancient ruins.

encounters.name: Literary Discovery
encounters.description: Ancient texts detailing the immortality technology using a serum. But immortality comes at a heavy cost.

encounters.name: Ambush
encounters.description: Attacked or confronted by colonists wanting to keep the city a secret.

encounters.name: Clue
encounters.description: Find evidence that reinforces your current theory.

objects.name: Alien Device
objects.description: What does it do?

objects.name: Historical Record
objects.description: Records of the ancient civilization's decline.

objects.name: Mysterious Key
objects.description: A key that opens something...

objects.name: Tablet of Laws
objects.description: An ancient law tablet that explains the ethical considerations of ancient society. Did they live up to their own ethics?

objects.name: Guardian Statue
objects.description: An impressive statue of a long dead race.

keyedScenes.name: Old Technology Comes to life
keyedScenes.description: A crewman accidentally activates some ancient tech. Perhaps there is a message or something else. Maybe it is dangerous. Ask your oracle for details but you learn things that reinforce your current suspicions.

regions.name: The Hidden Lab
regions.description: A ancient labratory where the colonists have taken over and where the serum is developed and tested.

locations.name: Specimen Containment
locations.description: Some of these don't look pleasant.

encounters.name: Conflict
encounters.description: Meet Guard Captain Rhea, head of security, fiercely loyal to the colony's leadership.

encounters.name: Computer Systems
encounters.description: Access records showing the serum's side effects and ethical concerns and development. Perhaps this system could be used to destroy the lab in some way.

objects.name: Records, Log Entries
objects.description: Documenting the development and side effects of the serum.

keyedScenes.name: A tense encounter
keyedScenes.description: Your crew is confronted at gun point...er phaser point. Inerpret it in context. Who does it? How do you resolve it?

keyedScenes.name: The big ending
keyedScenes.description: Hansen Rike, the leader of the survivors, confronts you here. How does this end?

resolution: By know you have uncovered the dark secret behind this place and established that what they are doing is morally compormised. You cannot let it continue. What are your options? A dramatic speech that turns it all around? Cold logic? A show of force? Time travel to get some humpback whales? What kind of support does Rike have? Does he have super human abilities? Perhaps a beautiful woman has a role to play.
